issue.title: [Python] Make changes to the C++ build setup due moving Python C++ API to PyArrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16345](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16345). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As the C++ build setup no longer needs to build Python C++ API make sure that the CMake is corrected and C++ build no longer depends op Python.
